dct:title.value: Immunoreactivity of Brucella melitensis 16M Soluble Antigen (BmSA) after Ion-exchange Chromatography

bibo:abstract.value: In the present study, soluble antigen of Brucella melitensis 16 M (BmSA) was prepared and purified by ion-exchange chromatography (DEAE-Sepharose) with linear gradient of NaCl (5 mM to 1 M) in TrisHCl buffer (10 mM, pH 7.5). The fractions obtained constituted three distinct peaks, containing varying amount of protein and carbohydrate.  The immune reactivity of these fractions in relation to lipopolysaccharide (LPS) â protein association by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) is described.
